description:
A german sorcerer who like his Mad scientist Nazi father has deep knowledge of the three realms and their shared history. Unlike his father however his interest is to rule the world and enslave everyone. 
Unlike many of the other characters from the realms he knows about the Kyo-O (Mad-Regent) a being that is the opposite of the Chojin (Overfiend) and has the power to destroy him.
name: Munchhausen II
